document.full_text: zoom technologies inc signed a licensing pact with chipmaker qualcomm inc, allowing the chinese mobile phone maker to develop and sell 3g devices using qualcomm's chip patents, sending its shares soaring as much as 64 percent.
document.title: zoom to make 3g phones with qualcomm chips
lines_and_colors: zoom technologies inc signed a licensing pact with chipmaker qualcomm inc, allowing the chinese mobile phone maker to develop and sell 3g devices using qualcomm's chip patents, sending its shares soaring as much as 64 percent.
